00016 #ifndef BT_HASHED_SIMPLE_PAIR_CACHE_H
00017 #define BT_HASHED_SIMPLE_PAIR_CACHE_H
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 #include "LinearMath/btAlignedObjectArray.h"
00022 
00023 const int BT_SIMPLE_NULL_PAIR=0xffffffff;
00024 
00025 struct btSimplePair
00026 {
00027         btSimplePair(int indexA,int indexB)
00028                 :m_indexA(indexA),
00029                 m_indexB(indexB),
00030                 m_userPointer(0)
00031         {
00032         }
00033 
00034         int m_indexA;
00035         int m_indexB;
00036         union
00037         {
00038                 void*   m_userPointer;
00039                 int             m_userValue;
00040         };
00041 };
00042 
00043 typedef btAlignedObjectArray<btSimplePair>      btSimplePairArray;
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 extern int gOverlappingSimplePairs;
00048 extern int gRemoveSimplePairs;
00049 extern int gAddedSimplePairs;
00050 extern int gFindSimplePairs;
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 class btHashedSimplePairCache
00056 {
00057         btSimplePairArray       m_overlappingPairArray;
00058                 
00059 
00060 protected:
00061         
00062         btAlignedObjectArray<int>       m_hashTable;
00063         btAlignedObjectArray<int>       m_next;
00064         
00065 
00066 public:
00067         btHashedSimplePairCache();
00068         virtual ~btHashedSimplePairCache();
00069         
00070         void removeAllPairs();
00071 
00072         virtual void*   removeOverlappingPair(int indexA,int indexB);
00073         
00074         // Add a pair and return the new pair. If the pair already exists,
00075         // no new pair is created and the old one is returned.
00076         virtual btSimplePair*   addOverlappingPair(int indexA,int indexB)
00077         {
00078                 gAddedSimplePairs++;
00079 
00080                 return internalAddPair(indexA,indexB);
00081         }
00082 
00083         
00084         virtual btSimplePair*   getOverlappingPairArrayPtr()
00085         {
00086                 return &m_overlappingPairArray[0];
00087         }
00088 
00089         const btSimplePair*     getOverlappingPairArrayPtr() const
00090         {
00091                 return &m_overlappingPairArray[0];
00092         }
00093 
00094         btSimplePairArray&      getOverlappingPairArray()
00095         {
00096                 return m_overlappingPairArray;
00097         }
00098 
00099         const btSimplePairArray&        getOverlappingPairArray() const
00100         {
00101                 return m_overlappingPairArray;
00102         }
00103 
00104         
00105         btSimplePair* findPair(int indexA,int indexB);
00106 
00107         int GetCount() const { return m_overlappingPairArray.size(); }
00108 
00109         int     getNumOverlappingPairs() const
00110         {
00111                 return m_overlappingPairArray.size();
00112         }
00113 private:
00114         
00115         btSimplePair*   internalAddPair(int indexA, int indexB);
00116 
00117         void    growTables();
00118 
00119         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool equalsPair(const btSimplePair& pair, int indexA, int indexB)
00120         {       
00121                 return pair.m_indexA == indexA && pair.m_indexB == indexB;
00122         }
00123 
00124         
00125         
00126         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int getHash(unsigned int indexA, unsigned int indexB)
00127         {
00128                 unsigned int key = indexA | (indexB << 16);
00129                 // Thomas Wang's hash
00130 
00131                 key += ~(key << 15);
00132                 key ^=  (key >> 10);
00133                 key +=  (key << 3);
00134                 key ^=  (key >> 6);
00135                 key += ~(key << 11);
00136                 key ^=  (key >> 16);
00137                 return key;
00138         }
00139         
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143 
00144         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE btSimplePair* internalFindPair(int proxyIdA , int proxyIdB, int hash)
00145         {
00146                 
00147                 int index = m_hashTable[hash];
00148                 
00149                 while( index != BT_SIMPLE_NULL_PAIR && equalsPair(m_overlappingPairArray[index], proxyIdA, proxyIdB) == false)
00150                 {
00151                         index = m_next[index];
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 if ( index == BT_SIMPLE_NULL_PAIR )
00155                 {
00156                         return NULL;
00157                 }
00158 
00159                 btAssert(index < m_overlappingPairArray.size());
00160 
00161                 return &m_overlappingPairArray[index];
00162         }
00163 
00164         
00165 };
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169 
00170 #endif //BT_HASHED_SIMPLE_PAIR_CACHE_H
